document.topic_text: Posted on April 21, 2016 by versatile-vegan I made a strategic decision to get out of Walla Walla for 36 hours. It was everything I thought it could be. And don’t get me wrong. I love my little town, but I’ve found that you can take the girl out of Portland, but you can’t take the Portland out of the girl. So I ate some amazing food.
